caption:
🤝 Feel the Workday difference in Costa Rica! 🇨🇷

Vale, Sr Financial Analyst, takes you behind the scenes at our Heredia office and shares what makes Workday such a special place to build a career. ✨

It's more than a cool workspace (though, it is pretty awesome 😉). Vale highlights the incredible community, the spirit of collaboration, and the opportunity to make a real impact on Workday's growth in Costa Rica.

Ready to experience the joy of being a Workmate? Connect with us to learn more about career opportunities at Workday! #WDAYLife #PuraVida
